flavor: You must yell "surge" to get the full effect.
stripped_text: Play only if you placed at least 1 virus counter on a program this turn. Place 2 virus counters on that program.
text:
Play only if you placed at least 1 virus counter on a program this turn.
Place 2 virus counters on that program.
title: Surge

flavor:
And all should cry, Beware! Beware!
His flashing eyes, his floating hair!
Weave a circle round him thrice,
And close your eyes with holy dread,
For he on honey-dew hath fed,
And drunk the milk of Paradise.
-Samuel Taylor Coleridge
stripped_text: The rez cost of each piece of ice is increased by 1 credit.
text: The rez cost of each piece of ice is increased by 1[credit].
title: Xanadu

stripped_text: You draw a starting hand of 9 cards.
text: You draw a starting hand of 9 cards.
title: Andromeda: Dispossessed Ristie

flavor: She preferred to do business in a club. Something about the lights and dancers clouded the judgment of the corporate simpletons she met there.
stripped_text: Remove 1 tag. Then, you may pay 1 credit to add this event to your grip.
text: Remove 1 tag. Then, you may pay 1[credit] to add this event to your grip.
title: Networking

flavor: If you don't have someone on the inside, find someone on the inside who's fond of desk ornaments.
stripped_text: Whenever you breach HQ, access 1 additional card.
text: Whenever you breach HQ, access 1 additional card.
title: HQ Interface

stripped_text: X recurring credits Use these credits during runs on HQ. X is the number of virus counters on Pheromones. Whenever you make a successful run on HQ, place 1 virus counter on Pheromones.
text:
X[recurring-credit]
Use these credits during runs on HQ. X is the number of virus counters on Pheromones.
Whenever you make a successful run on HQ, place 1 virus counter on Pheromones.
title: Pheromones

flavor: She at her P.A.D. I at my rig. Low lights. Smooth jazz. Love blooms.
stripped_text: Draw 5 cards.
text: Draw 5 cards.
title: Quality Time

flavor: Do you really need another one?
stripped_text: Whenever you install a piece of hardware (including Replicator), you may search your stack for another copy of that hardware, reveal it, and add it your grip. Shuffle your stack.
text: Whenever you install a piece of hardware (including Replicator), you may search your stack for another copy of that hardware, reveal it, and add it your grip. Shuffle your stack.
title: Replicator

flavor:
"The itsy bitsy spider went up the data spout…"
-Chaos Theory
stripped_text: If you have at least 2{link}, the memory cost of this program is 0 mu, even if it is not installed. Interface -> 2click: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 1click: +1 strength.
text: If you have at least 2{link}, the memory cost of this program is 0[mu], even if it is not installed. Interface -> 2[click]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 1[click]: +1 strength.
title: Creeper

flavor: Early permutations of the kraken proved to be insatiable, ice-devouring marauders. Not much has changed.
stripped_text: Play only if you stole an agenda this turn. Choose a server. The Corp trashes 1 piece of ice protecting that server.
text:
Play only if you stole an agenda this turn.
Choose a server. The Corp trashes 1 piece of ice protecting that server.
title: Kraken

flavor: "You aren't the only type of runner in New Angeles."
stripped_text: You cannot use Kati Jones more than once per turn. click: Place 3 credits from the bank on Kati Jones. click: Take all credits from Kati Jones.
text:
You cannot use Kati Jones more than once per turn.
[click]: Place 3[credit] from the bank on Kati Jones.
[click]: Take all credits from Kati Jones.
title: Kati Jones

stripped_text: Place 16 credits from the bank on Eve Campaign when it is rezzed. When there are no credits left on Eve Campaign, trash it. When your turn begins, take 2 credits from Eve Campaign.
text:
Place 16[credit] from the bank on Eve Campaign when it is rezzed. When there are no credits left on Eve Campaign, trash it.
When your turn begins, take 2[credit] from Eve Campaign.
title: Eve Campaign

stripped_text: Shuffle 1 card from HQ into R&D.
text: Shuffle 1 card from HQ into R&D.
title: Rework

stripped_text: Subroutine The Runner cannot jack out for the remainder of this run. Trash Whirlpool.
text: [subroutine] The Runner cannot jack out for the remainder of this run. Trash Whirlpool.
title: Whirlpool

flavor: Despite its appearance, the Hokusai Grid is the most notorious research facility at Jinteki.
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on this server, do 1 net damage. Limit 1 region per server.
text: Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on this server, do 1 net damage. Limit 1 region per server.
title: Hokusai Grid

stripped_text: Subroutine Trace 2 If successful, look at a number of cards from the top of the Runner's stack equal to the amount by which your trace strength exceeded his or her link strength. Trash 1 of those cards, and arrange the rest in any order.
text: [subroutine] <trace>Trace 2</trace> If successful, look at a number of cards from the top of the Runner's stack equal to the amount by which your trace strength exceeded his or her link strength. Trash 1 of those cards, and arrange the rest in any order.
title: Data Hound

flavor: Keeping tabs on the world, one screen at a time.
stripped_text: Whenever there is a successful run on this server, trace 5 if successful, give the Runner 1 tag. If unsuccessful, trash Bernice Mai.
text: Whenever there is a successful run on this server, <trace>trace 5</trace> if successful, give the Runner 1 tag. If unsuccessful, trash Bernice Mai.
title: Bernice Mai

stripped_text: Salvage can be advanced only while rezzed and gains Subroutine Trace 2 If successful, give the Runner 1 tag. for each advancement token on it.
text: Salvage can be advanced only while rezzed and gains “[subroutine] <trace>Trace 2</trace> If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.” for each advancement token on it.
title: Salvage

flavor: "A job done once is a job done right."
stripped_text: 2 recurring credits You can spend hosted credits to take the basic action to advance cards in the root of or protecting this server.
text:
2[recurring-credit]
You can spend hosted credits to take the basic action to advance cards in the root of or protecting this server.
title: Simone Diego

flavor: "It's kind of like an anagram." -designer Phoenix
stripped_text: Trace 7 If successful, trash 1 virtual resource or 1 link.
text: Trace 7 If successful, trash 1 virtual resource or 1 link.
title: Foxfire
